name: GuildBound
description:
FIGHT
  • Dynamic Combat
    Customize your fighting style, switch between bows, magic, two handed and one handed weapons on the fly. Dodge, parry or block strong enemy attacks.
  • Skill tree
    Unlock powerful spells and abilities, build your character as you want, but be thoughtful as foes have different weaknesses and resistances.
  • Bosses
    Some foes have earned their champion status and will be harder than others.
    Be careful when fighting these monsters as they will have special attacks and magic that will test your skill.
EXPLORE
  • Open World
    Traverse a fantastical open world: explore forgotten ruins, caves, dungeons and ancient civilizations, trade with merchants in cities, and hunt across the open plains, mountains and forests.
  • Quests
    Around the world you will find many people in need of help. You will also find a lot of contracts and quests requests in the guildhall.
  • Loot
    Find treasure, weapons and armor by killing creatures, exploring, questing and solving mysteries and puzzles. Unique gear will give you amazing perks and stats.
EXPERIENCE
  • Guildbound
    From early childhood you were bound to the guild your father was in.
    When bound to a guild you are in it for life, leaving or betraying the guild means death.
  • The rift
    It has been 50 years since the first rift, but many remnants of the endless horde still remain
    Mages foretold a new rift is forming and the threat from beyond the veil is real.
